Articles.Content: Has anyone else thought that we should be able to go into all the buildings at ksc? And their should be interiors to our ships that we can walk/flout around in? & that the interior/IVA of that ship should have consoles that we can use to do certain commands like customs 1-9?

First off, welcome to the forums!

Unfortunately, improved interiors and IVA features of that nature happen to be on our What Not to Suggest list. It's not a reflection of the quality of the suggestion; it's just that, like other items on the list, the topic's been brought up so much in the past that we figure it's better to keep the playing field open to other suggestions, since there's relatively little chance of anything being said that isn't a rehash of what's already been said before.

On that note, I'll have to close this thread. Have a nice day
